hadiths.text: Uqba b. 'Amir reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:What wonderful verses have been sent down today. the like of which has never been seen! They are:" Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the dawn," and" Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of men

chapter.eng-name: The virtue of reciting al-Mu`awwidhatain (the two surahs seeking refuge with Allah)
